results.content:
I've encountered a number of errors in the videos, and the TA is essentially non-responsive in addressing these. Still waiting for two corrupt download files to be replaced. 

The course itself is actually pretty good, but the support for it is just awful.

results.content: Awesome course, Thing I Liked Most the Electron documentation is pretty detailed, and I am sure that I could figure that out by reading through on my own. Also, some information on how to include local storage with the application is cool. So my final comment Great course, very good explanations.

results.content: Great course with limited courses are available on electron. This is one of the fine course available on udemy. It was one if the best pick of electron courses on udemy. Explained very well. No voice problem. Pace is good. Overall a worth to buy such a course on decent money.
